content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all photo tutorials in one printable file without advertisements stay cool and chic under the sun with a crochet sun hat the summer lovin sun hat is a stylish and functional accessory perfect for sunny days made with lion brand rewind yarn this crochet sun hat is lightweight breathable and has a wide brim that provides ample shade from the sun purchase the kit here aff lion brand also has a full kit of the summer lovin sun hat available on their website the kit includes your choice of color and a digital copy of the pattern **fits head sizes** - toddler 18 - 19 circumference - 270 yards - child 19 - 20 5 circumference - 290 yards - teen / adult small 21 - 22 circumference - 320 yards - adult medium / large 22 5 - 23 5 circumference - 340 yards **yarn** the sample in the photos was crocheted with lion brand yarns rewind in willow bulky weight / 5 yarn 70% polyester / 30% viscose 219 yards / 200 m / 100 g / 3 5 oz other comparable yarns may be used as long as gauge is met testers were able to substitute worsted weight cotton yarns with no gauge issues **pattern notes** the pattern is a written pattern and also includes photo tutorials where needed crochet sun hat design is an a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity jennifer renaud all of my patterns are written in standard american terms unless noted otherwise please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions © 2024 designed by jennifer renaud aka a crocheted simplicity all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of a crocheted simplicity the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and charity sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to a crocheted simplicity is greatly appreciated no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from jennifer renaud 1 https //www acrochetedsimplicity com/crochet-sun-hat/
